overview: Frankie Thomas plays Bob Lewis, leader of a gang consisting of Sailor, Murph, Monk, Trouble and Yap. The son of disgraced police officer Lt. Lewis, Bob vows to clear his dad's name, and also to prove that accused murderer Tommy Shay is innocent.
tagline: HE WOULDN'T WELCH! Beaten...battered...broke...he remained faithful to the only law he knew!
title: Code of the Streets
